name: Wheels of Fate
description:
"Seriously, [Wheels of Fate] has a ton of polish and looks crisp as f*** and the game mechanics are top notch! It's a blast to play w/buds. A multiplayer game with gloss!"

-Ezmyrelda Andrade

Controls - Left, Right, Jump, Slam-Down, Brake

  • Player 1: | A | D | W | S | E |
  • Player 2: | K | ; | O | L | P |

Wheels of Fate is a multiplayer-centric 2D game where players control fast-moving "wheels", attempting to crash into other players; gain points by running into an opponent at a higher speed than them!

The game is currently in Beta (so expect plenty of bugs and lack of polish) with updates being pushed regularly as I have time in-between my busy schedule. A version for Wii U is planned for release in Fall 2015.
